attributes.action: The British should have a day to celebrate the NHS once the outbreak is over.
attributes.additional_details: The NHS is poorly funded, often under appreciated yet a fundamental part of our democracy, social justice, and well being. We should celebrate the institution, its workers, and their absolute dedication to keeping us safe.
attributes.background:
Allow a National day for street parties, similar to
The Queen’s coronation, coupled with bus parades for NHS workers to be applauded for their extreme heroism and absolute dedication to our health and wellbeing.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
